entry.title: Tom Cotton Presses the Secret Service for Answers on West Wing Cocaine
entry.summary: The Arkansas senator asked how many times the Secret Service has discovered illegal drugs at the White House complex in the last five years.

entry.summary: Iranian personnel fired multiple rounds at one of the tankers, but departed once a Navy destroyer arrived on the scene.

entry.title: Suspect in Philadelphia Shooting Charged with Murdering Five People
entry.summary: Kimbrady Carriker is accused of fatally shooting five men and injuring two children.

entry.title: Pro-Abortion Groups Clear Key Hurdle in Fight to Strip Parental Consent from Reproductive, Gender Procedures

entry.title: Russia Launches Overnight Drone Attack on Kyiv

entry.title: R Weekly 2023-W26 Table to Markdown, Model Sharing, and Rhub debugging
entry.summary: Hello and welcome to this new issue! How to have (my) content shared by R Weekly? This weekâ€™s release was curated by , with help from the R Weekly team members and contributors. Highlight Convert a Word table to Markdown How Can Someone Else Use My Model? How to debug your package in a {rhub} fedora container before sending to CRAN? Insights In Survivor is entering the merge down on numbers a disadvantage? entry.title: The Land of the (Almost) Midnight Sun
entry.summary: A photo journal from Oslo.

entry.title: The Lost Art of Album Art
entry.summary: Looking back at pop culture we had in common.

entry.title: Broader Scope for Conservation Leasing Would Improve Federal Land Management
entry.summary: The current proposal for conservation leasing can be improved to make it a more viable and valuable program.

entry.title: The Titan Disaster Shows the Allure and Terror of the Sea
entry.summary: The quests for adventure, profit, survival, and freedom have long motivated nautical undertakings, and insane risk-taking has often been part of the bargain.

entry.title: One Year Ago, Dobbs Gave New Life to the Pro-Life Movement, but We Canâ€™t Quit Now
entry.summary: The ruling did not end abortion in our nation, and those of us who stand for life still have a lot of work to do to make abortion unthinkable, not just illegal.

entry.title: Dobbs Turns One
entry.summary: The laws that have taken effect after the decision have very likely already saved tens of thousands of human lives.

entry.title: Brawls, Theft, Drugs: How Rampant Crime Turned Westfield Mall into a Symbol of San Franciscoâ€™s Decline
entry.summary: Police have been called to the mall over 5,000 times over the last three years, according to data obtained by NR.

entry.title: R Weekly 2023-W25 slice(), columns, Bayes
entry.summary:
Hello and welcome to this new issue! How to have (my) content shared by R Weekly? This weekâ€™s release was curated by Jonathan Carroll, with help from the RWeekly team members and contributors. Highlight Row relational operations with slice() Merging columns together and fixing up column labels in {gt} 0.9.0 Bayes Lived Here (Probably) Insights Step By Step: recreating a volcano plot in R Bayesian structural equation model tutorial My Computer Can Read!
